item.description: CHANGES FROM v1.17: * Update dependencies * Update Chinese translation (by Clazex) * Reselect lines after performing merge operations in Conflict Solver (by scrangos) * New hotkeys: Ctrl+Left Ctrl+Right that find the previous conflict and next conflict (by scrangos) * If there are 4+ definitions including the virtual definition, skip the stellaris definition if its there when the conflict is being selected as the default selected definition for the left side (by scrangos) * Add show self conflicts mod filter option (self conflicts are ignored by default now) * Add option to export to Paradox Launcher Json format (min launcher version 2021.7.rc5) * Conflict Solver bracket count (by scrangos) * Add mod source indicator * Various fixes

CHANGES FROM v1.17: * Update dependencies * Update Chinese translation (by Clazex) * Reselect lines after performing merge operations in Conflict Solver (by scrangos) * New hotkeys: Ctrl+Left Ctrl+Right that find the previous conflict and next conflict (by scrangos) * If there are 4+ definitions including the virtual definition, skip the stellaris definition if its there when the conflict is being selected as the default selected definition for the left side (by scrangos) * Add show self conflicts mod filter option (self conflicts are ignored by default now) * Add option to export to Paradox Launcher Json format (min launcher version 2021.7.rc5) * Conflict Solver bracket count (by scrangos) * Add mod source indicator * Various fixes
